sentences.en: A confluence of artistry, superb choreography, and stage design.
sentences.cn: 艺术技巧 、 优美的舞蹈和舞台设计的融合.

sentences.en: At sur - rhone, north Durance River and the confluence rhone 4 kilometers.
sentences.cn: 在罗讷河畔, 南距迪朗斯河和罗讷河汇合处4公里.

sentences.en: Confluence rivers, and finally into the sea.
sentences.cn: 百川汇流, 终成大海.

sentences.en: Confluence: a flowing together of two or more streams.
sentences.cn: 汇集: 两条或多条溪流的聚合在一起.

sentences.en: It a confluence of knowledge and talents.
sentences.cn: 因此,这里是知识与人才的汇集之处.

sentences.en: It emerges from a confluence of factors, some very subtle.
sentences.cn: 它浮现于多因子的合流, 非常微妙的.

sentences.en: It's the confluence of three rivers.
sentences.cn: 就是三条江交汇的地方嘛.

sentences.en: Like most cases of extreme weather, its severity was due to an unusual confluence of events.
sentences.cn: 如同大多数极端天气状况一样，其剧烈程度是由于几种气象条件反常地汇集在一起造成的。

sentences.en: Pittsburgh is located at the confluence of the Allegheny and Monongahela rivers.
sentences.cn: 张家港位于长江与大海的汇合处.

sentences.en: The 160-metre falls mark the dramatic confluence of the rivers Nera and Velino.
sentences.cn: 内拉河和韦利诺河的汇合处是落差达160米的瀑布，景象十分壮观。

sentences.en: The bleak outlook stems from a confluence of factors.
sentences.cn: 暗淡的前景是一系列因素合力所致.

sentences.en: The characters of series process are suitable for the confluence desilication.
sentences.cn: 合流脱硅是简化联合法生产流程、降低能耗的有效措施.

sentences.en: The whole DV movements actually was a confluence of several trends.
sentences.cn: 整个当时的DV运动,实际上是几股潮流的同谋.

sentences.en: Then they will see there a confluence of truth.
sentences.cn: 然后他们将会发现真理的汇集.

sentences.en: They built the city at the confluence of two rivers.
sentences.cn: 他们建造了城市的汇合两条河流.

words.tran_cn: （河流的）汇合、汇流点；（人或物的）聚集

trans.tran_cn: <术>（河流的）汇合处，汇流处，<正>（事物的）汇合，汇流
trans.tran_en: the place where two or more rivers flow together
